price: А да хоћемо, Ми бисмо учинили да вас на Земљи наследе анђели;
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
